We are always here at the end of the phone to help, but the quickest way to make a change to your policy*, report a claim or renew your policy is online, with MyAllianz.

These are just some of the great benefits of using our simple online service, as well as allowing you to upload outstanding documents and view & print important policy information. All in a safe and secure environment.

It’s easy to sign up too, just call us on 01 448 4848 today. We’re open Monday to Friday 9am to 5pm and on Saturday from 9am to 1pm.
CALL US TO REGISTER
 

*If you make a change to your policy during your insurance period, like the above options outlined, Allianz will recalculate your premium. This may result in an additional premium owed to Allianz or a return of premium to you.
